description: Default blocked command patterns for PreToolUse hook. Configure via hooks.enabled in shirokuma-docs.config.yaml

rules.reason: PR merge requires explicit user approval. Ask the user before merging.
Force push requires explicit user approval. This can overwrite remote history.
Hard reset requires explicit user approval. This discards all uncommitted changes.
Discarding all working tree changes requires explicit user approval.
Deleting untracked files requires explicit user approval.
Force deleting a branch requires explicit user approval.
